content: Hello Jeyachandran! Nice to meet you. Based on your resume, it seems like you have a strong background in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Can you tell me more about your experience in developing an AI chatbot with real-time database integration during your internship at Shine Logics? What were the key features of the chatbot, and how did you ensure its seamless integration with the e-commerce website?
yes sir i am a full stack devloper

Based on your resume, it seems like you have a good balance of skills in both frontend and backend development. Can you tell me more about your experience with Node.js and MongoDB? How have you used these technologies in your projects, and what are some of the challenges you've faced while working with them?
